item.title: The Blessings of Family Work Projects
item.description:
The Blessings of Family Work Projects by undefined Dean Jarman, President, Salt Lake University Second Stake given in Session 6 of 152nd Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1982
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Dean Jarman, President, Salt Lake University Second Stake
